trans-unit.source: Provides a file system implementation of the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un'implementazione di sistema di file di <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>classe.</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebResponse class implements the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract` base class to return file system resources for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: La classe FileWebResponse implementa il <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> `abstract` classe di base per restituire le risorse del file system per la <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest></xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: Client applications do not create FileWebResponse instances directly; instead, they are created by calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method on a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: Le applicazioni client di creare istanze FileWebResponse direttamente. al contrario, vengono creati chiamando il <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>metodo su un <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>istanza.</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance that provides read-only access to a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>metodo restituisce un <xref:System.IO.Stream>istanza che fornisce l'accesso in sola lettura a una risorsa del file system.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebResponse class relies on the <xref:System.IO.File> class for error handling and code access security.
trans-unit.target: La classe FileWebResponse si basa sulla <xref:System.IO.File>classe per la gestione degli errori e di sicurezza dall'accesso di codice.</xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> classe dalle istanze specificate del <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classi.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore implementa l' <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interfaccia per la <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>classe.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> istanza che contiene le informazioni necessarie per serializzare la nuova <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> class that contains the source of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classe che contiene l'origine del flusso serializzato associato alla nuova <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Closes the response stream.
trans-unit.target: Chiude il flusso di risposta.

trans-unit.source: The Close method cleans up the resources used by a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> and closes the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Close pulisce le risorse usate da un <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>e chiude il flusso di risposta chiamando il <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il flusso di risposta deve essere chiuso per evitare l'esaurimento delle risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: You can closes the response stream by calling either <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or Close
trans-unit.target: È possibile chiudere il flusso di risposta mediante una chiamata <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o di chiusura</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the content in the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la lunghezza del contenuto in una risorsa del file system.

trans-unit.source: The ContentLength property contains the length, in bytes, of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ContentLength contiene la lunghezza, espressa in byte, della risorsa del file system.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes returned from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di byte restituiti dalla risorsa del file system.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di contenuto della risorsa del file system.

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property contains the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ContentType contiene il tipo di contenuto della risorsa del file system.

trans-unit.source: The value of ContentType is always "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: Il valore di ContentType è sempre "binary/octet-stream".

trans-unit.source: The value "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: Il valore "binary/octet-stream".

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Popola un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> con i dati necessari per serializzare l'oggetto di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli oggetti inclusi nel <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>vengono automaticamente rilevati e serializzati dal formattatore.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> da popolare con i dati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>che specifica la destinazione per questa serializzazione.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il flusso di dati dalla risorsa del file system.

trans-unit.source: The GetResponseStream method returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetResponseStream restituisce il flusso di dati dalla risorsa del file system.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il flusso di risposta deve essere chiuso per evitare l'esaurimento delle risorse di sistema.

trans-unit.source: The response stream can be closed by calling <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
trans-unit.target: Il flusso di risposta può essere chiuso chiamando <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A></xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> for reading data from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.IO.Stream>per la lettura dei dati dalla risorsa del file system.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di coppie nome/valore di intestazione associate alla risposta.

trans-unit.source: The Headers property contains two name/value pairs, one for content length and one for content type, both of which are also exposed as properties, <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà delle intestazioni contiene due coppie nome/valore, una per la lunghezza e uno per tipo di contenuto, entrambi vengono inoltre esposti come proprietà <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>e <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> that contains the header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>contenente le coppie nome/valore di intestazione associate alla risposta.</xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'URI della risorsa del file system che ha fornito la risposta.

trans-unit.source: The ResponseUri property contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ResponseUri contiene l'URI della risorsa del file system che ha fornito la risposta.

trans-unit.source: This is always the file system resource that was requested.
trans-unit.target: È sempre la risorsa del file system è stato richiesto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>che contiene l'URI della risorsa del file system che ha fornito la risposta.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*> property is supported by the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>proprietà è supportata dal <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>

trans-unit.source: This property is always true for [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è sempre true per [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: true if the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*> property is supported by the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true se il <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>proprietà è supportata dal <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref> dell'istanza; in caso contrario, false.</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Popola un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> istanza con i dati necessari per serializzare il <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> , which will hold the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> , che conterrà i dati serializzati per il <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> containing the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>contenente la destinazione del flusso serializzato associato alla nuova <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
